DataElement.preferredName: Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain Treatment Other Medication Administered Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to other medication as treatment for pain from any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain Treatment Other Medication Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to other medication as treatment for pain from any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.:An unpleasant sensation induced by noxious stimuli and generally received by specialized nerve endings.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A disorder that affects the masticatory muscles and temporomandibular joint.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update
